issue.title: The static_cast expression in convertible_to has the wrong operand

discussion.p: The specification of convertible_to implicitly requires static_cast<To>(f()) to be equality-preserving. Under p1, the operand of this expression is f, but what we really want is for f() to be treated as the operand. We should just use declval (which is treated specially by the definition of "operand" for this purpose) instead of reinventing the wheel.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4885.
